The Flight of the Noldoli from Valinor
The Transactions of the Honourable Society of Cymmrodorion Session 1923-24
The Year's Work in English Studies

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[5 January|5]]''' - [[Wolfe Morris]], who would voice of [[Gollum]] in the 1968 radio series of ''[[The Hobbit (1968 radio series)|The Hobbit]]'', is born.
* '''?''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s "Philology: General Works" is published in ''[[The Year's Work in English Studies]]''.
==February==
* '''[[2 February|2]]''' - Brother [[Joseph Power]] is born.
==March==
* '''[[14 March|14]]''' - [[John Wain]], [[Inklings|Inkling]], is born.
==April==
* '''[[23 April|23]]''' - ''[[Sir Gawain and the Green Knight (edition)|Sir Gawain and the Green Knight]]'' is first published.
* '''?''' - "[[Some Contributions to Middle-English Lexicography]]", an essay by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], is published.
==June==
* '''[[6 June|6]]''' - Actor [[Gareth Jones]] is born.
* '''[[8 June|8]]''' - Father [[Robert Murray]], friend of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and his family, is born.
* '''[[12 June|12]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Mr Ashton|a letter to a Mr. Ashton]].
* '''[[27 June|27]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 7]].
* '''?''' - Tolkien's poem ''[[Light as Leaf on Lindentree]]'' is published in ''The Gryphon''.

==July==
* '''[[22 July|22]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 8]].
* '''[[22 July|22]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to H.F.B. Brett-Smith (22 July 1925)|a letter to H.F.B. Brett-Smith]].
* '''?''' - ''[[The Devil's Coach-Horses]]'', an essay by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], is published.

==August==
* '''[[8 August|8]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to H.F.B. Brett-Smith (8 August 1925)|a letter to H.F.B. Brett-Smith]].
* '''[[23 August|23]]''' - The first recorded date in the writing of the ''[[Lay of Leithian]]'', at Line 557.

==October==
* '''[[21 October|21]]''' - Tolkien submits his resignation from [[University of Leeds|Leeds]], his employment officially ended [[31 December|December 31]], 1925.
* '''[[29 October|29]]''' - [[Paul Daneman]], who would voice [[Bilbo Baggins]] in the 1968 radio series of ''[[The Hobbit (1968 radio series)|The Hobbit]]'', is born.
==December==
* '''[[23 December|23]]''' - [[Rayner Unwin]] is born.
* '''[[25 December|25]]''' - [[Father Christmas]] writes a [[Letters from Father Christmas|letter]] to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s children.
==?==
* '''?''' - Tolkien moves from Leeds to [[Pembroke College]] of [[University of Oxford|Oxford]] where he is elected Rawlinson and Bosworth Professor of Anglo-Saxon.
* '''?''' - ''[[The Flight of the Noldoli from Valinor]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - The journal ''[[The Transactions of the Honourable Society of Cymmrodorion Session 1923-24]]'', which includes an essay with a contribution by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] as translator, is published.
* '''?''' - Author and academic [[Charles Moorman]] is born.

{{Years|1922|1923|1924|1925|1926|1927|1928|}}
